mapper.sql: id, associationtime, associationname, level, responsibility, teachernum, stunum, credit, facultynum, majornum, gradenum, stuname, url
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from association
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into association (id, associationtime, associationname, level, responsibility, teachernum, stunum, credit, facultynum, majornum, gradenum, stuname, url) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{associationtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{associationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responsibility,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teachernum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stunum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credit,jdbcType=REAL}, #{facultynum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{majornum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update association
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

associationname = #{record.associationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

associationname = #{associationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
